item.title: Long Street and Waterson Street really filthy, 17th November
item.description:
Dumped sofa at the rear of Tescos on Long St. Piles of rubbish around the Lime and Voi bike stand on Long St. This has been reported to Lime but no response Opened bags of rubbish in 2 piles on Waterson St. Long St. hasn’t been cleaned for ages.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Long Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Top of Westheath Road, before Whitestone Walk, 17th November
item.description:
There is a massive pothole which I drove over which has caused significant damage to my car. I now need to have my front wheel bearings, track rod ends and shock mounts replaced. This has been a very distressing experience. I went back to measure the pothole and it's 2 x 3ft wide and 18 cm deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Heath Road, West Hampstead, Hampstead, London Borough of Camden
Report on FixMyStreet
